sentences: Edward Abraham Snyder (February 22, 1919 â€“ March 10, 2011) was an American composer and songwriter.
Snyder is credited with co-writing the English language lyrics and music for Frank Sinatra's 1966 hit, "Strangers in the Night".
Snyder was born in New York City on February 22, 1919.
Eddie Snyder died on March 10, 2011, in Lakeland, Florida, at the age of 92.
